activities: OutIndex provides our customers with professional services that include the data processing (indexing, keyword searching, output) of electronic files such as user email, word processing documents and spreadsheets for legal, regulatory compliance or investigation activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
recoursemech: With respect to any complaints relating to this policy that cannot be resolved through our internal processes, OutIndex agrees to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU data protection authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles. In the event that we or such authorities determine that we did not comply with this policy, we will take appropriate steps to address any adverse effects and to promote future compliance. Any person who we determine is in violation of our privacy policies will be subject to disciplinary process.
